description.value:
When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you develop a talent for picking out what is out of place in your surroundings. You gain proficiency in Wisdom (Insight) and Intelligence (Investigation) and if you are already proficient in either skill then you gain expertise instead. Whenever you make a Wisdom (Insight) check to determine whether a creature is lying, treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as an 10.

Furthermore, you can use your Cunning Action to make a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a hidden creature or object or to make an Intelligence (Investigation) check to uncover or decipher clues.

Upon reaching this level and getting this feature, you will have to manually update your character sheet to reflect your updated proficiencies. It's recommended that you edit this feat with these changes to track them.
